results.title: Metformin Prevents Follicular Atresia in Aging Laying Chickens through Activation of PI3K/AKT and Calcium Signaling Pathways
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Prevents @<m>DISEASE_Follicular_Cyst</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005497 @@@Follicular Atresia@@@ in Aging Laying Chickens through Activation of @GENE_PIK3R1 @GENE_18708 @@@PI3K@@@/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_11651 @@@AKT@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@Calcium@@@ Signaling Pathways

results.title: Prenatal metformin treatment improves ovarian function in offspring of obese rats.
results.text_hl: Treatment using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could not prevent advanced puberty, but we observed that the number of antral follicles, @<m>DISEASE_Follicular_Cyst</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005497 @@@follicular cysts@@@ and multi-oocyte follicles returned to control values in the female offspring of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ mothers treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Álvarez D, Ceballo K, Olguín S, Martinez-Pinto J, Maliqueo M, Fernandois D, Sotomayor-Zárate R, Cruz G. Prenatal metformin treatment improves ovarian function in offspring of obese rats. J Endocrinol. 2018 Dec 1;239(3):325-338. PMID: 30334444
